sentences.en: At the moment Brown believed himself, and mused with self - approbation how he protected his squad.
sentences.cn: 布朗现在自己也相信了, 他对班里弟兄有多体恤,想着想着还感到得意了.
爸爸笑了笑表示同意 [ 满意 ].

sentences.en: He bestowed his hearty approbation, however, on their species of house.
sentences.cn: 不过, 他对她们住宅的类型,宽大地予以衷心的称赞.

sentences.en: He tasted the wine of audience approbation.
sentences.cn: 他尝到了像酒般令人陶醉的听众赞许滋味.

sentences.en: I anticipate nothing but grateful approbation .
sentences.cn: 我预料大家只有感激赞许。

sentences.en: I anticipate nothing but grateful approbation.
sentences.cn: 我预料大家只有感激赞许.

sentences.en: I had no solace from self - approbation ; none ever from self - respect .
sentences.cn: 我不能从自满、甚至不能从 自尊 中得到安慰.

sentences.en: Jane Austen: She liked him too little to care for his approbation.
sentences.cn: 奥斯丁: 因为她根本不喜欢他,因此不稀罕他的垂青.

sentences.en: Julian Lloyd Webber thinks his brother would like the approbation of serious critics.
sentences.cn: 朱利安·劳埃德·韦伯认为他弟弟希望获得严肃批评家的认可。

sentences.en: Not enough feedback or approbation commensurate with the performance.
sentences.cn: 工作表现得不到足够的反馈或认可.

sentences.en: Professor LIANG Jiehua received approbation after subscribing.
sentences.cn: (十)梁洁华教授向扶贫助教基金捐款后,接受嘉许状.

sentences.en: The manager surveyed her report with approbation.
sentences.cn: 经理赞许地审读她的报告.

sentences.en: The play received the approbation of the mass media.
sentences.cn: 这个剧本受到大众媒体的欢迎.
这项建议得到了他的赞许.

sentences.en: The result has not met universal approbation.
sentences.cn: 该结果尚未获得普遍认同。

sentences.en: The semi - drunk's suggestion that someone should sing a song was received with unqualified approbation by everybody.
sentences.cn: 半 醉汉要求唱歌的建议得到大家无条件的拥护.

sentences.en: They make bad blood, can't forgive, sniff right , and left for approbation.
sentences.cn: 他们有一些坏作风, 他们不饶人.为了得到公众的承认, 他们四处寻风摸底.
